title: Forest Project Configuration
description: Per-project configuration for the forest CLI tool. Overrides global settings.

repo.description: Absolute path to the git repository.

worktree_dir.description: Override the global worktree directory for this project. Supports ~ for home directory. Empty uses the global default.

branch.description: Override the global base branch for this project. Empty uses the global default.

copy.description: Files relative to the repo root to copy into each new worktree.

layout.description: Tmux window layout for this project. Overrides the global layout entirely when set.

window.description: A tmux window in the session layout.

name.description: Tmux window title. If empty, tmux uses its default.

command.description: Shell command to run in this window. An empty string opens a plain shell.
